thread.section_title: Hampton Inn Manhattan-SoHo - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Can't Beat It
thread.title_full: Can't Beat It - Review of Hampton Inn Manhattan-SoHo, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: William M
title: Can't Beat It
text:
We stayed at this Hampton in for two nights, 1/25-27 for 115.00 per night including a hot breakfast. They upgraded us to a suite on the 17th floor. The hotel is very clean and quiet. There is a bar just off the lobby. The hotel is located just off 6th Ave.
Two subway lines are just a few blocks away (Red & Blue).
